titleStmt.title: Hebdomada sacra: A weekes deuotion: or, Seuen poeticall meditations vpon the second chapter of St. Matthewes gospell. Written, by Roger Cocks.
titleStmt.author: Cocks, Roger, fl. 1630-1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Henrt Seile, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Tygers head,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A weekes deuotion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in St. Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Tygers head
